enhanced_description: Lean Pitch, an Edu-Tech solutions company launched in 2011 and headquartered in Bengaluru, specializes in organizational development, coaching, employee engagement, and upskilling. It offers comprehensive training, consulting, and coaching services, including specialized Agile Training Courses and Scrum Master Certification. The company also provides a Corporate Learning Management System (LMS) and course authoring capabilities, aiming to improve communication, collaboration, and project management skills within organizations and for individual professionals.

Managing corporate learning content and courses
